About

I am an Young Australian Developer who works by independently most of the time but will work with other people if needed! I am also a Fulltime student Mon-Fri. I mainly work in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript but also work in LUA using Roblox Studio. I like to work in Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe Photoshop in my spare time editing photos and videos for various people.

When I am not working on Projects I like to hangout with my friends outside doing various things like Shopping, Swimming, Moutainbike Riding and more. I enjoy Mountainbike riding as it clears my mind of the things that're stressing me in life. I have devoted my whole life into enjoying myself as life is to short to sit at home doing nothing, when you could be socializing togther with friends and family.
